column2: This glove, wherever it had not touched the muddy ground, was of irreproachable odor.

column2: He ran along the high road, took the path he had before taken, and reaching the ferry, interrogated the boatman.
column3: He ran along the high road, took the path he had before taken, and reaching the ferry, interrogated the boatman.

column2: About seven o'clock in the evening, the boatman had taken over a young woman, wrapped in a black mantle, who appeared to be very anxious not to be recognized; but entirely on account of her precautions, the boatman had paid more attention to her and discovered that she was young and pretty.

column2: You have promised to be secret, my good monsieur? said the old man.
